tips.title: Create a Quiet Environment
tips.description: Reduce background noise by closing windows, turning off TVs, and asking others to speak quietly.

tips.title: Maintain Consistent Volume
tips.description: Try to keep your voice at a steady volume level throughout the session.

tips.title: Speak Clearly
tips.description: Enunciate your words clearly and take your time when speaking.

tips.title: Maintain Steady Rhythm
tips.description: Try to keep a consistent pace and rhythm in your speech.

tips.title: Keep Your Voice Relaxed
tips.description: Avoid tension in your voice and maintain a calm, relaxed tone.
